												82 Minutes into the game so far, and I have to say that while I'm enjoying the game, the AI is incredibly slow. Once you get out in front, there's no chance of the AI catching up. They definitely need to be more aggressive. It took me all of one race to get used to the way that the truck handled, with the back end swinging out to drift around corners. I'll admit that I hit a few walls in the process, but it was fairly easy to recover.I think there's a heck of a lot of potential in this game. I just hope the devs are willing to put the time into it!Edit: Also, on one race, one of the AI trucks flipped over and didn't recover. it stayed in the middle of the track for the remainder of the race with it's engine revving. Maybe some AI recovery would be an idea to implement so they can get back into the race?
